#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int n,k,found,*a,i,j;
	found=0;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
	a=new long long int[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
	for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
	{
		for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
		if(a[i]+a[j]==k)
		{
			found=1;
			break;
		}
	}
	if(found)
	printf("Yes\n");
	else
	printf("No\n");
}
